lead_paragraph: The company will begin shipping Office 2016, an overhaul of the software suite, which offers apps like Word, PowerPoint, Excel, OneNote and Outlook.

headline.main: New Microsoft Office With Continual Updates
headline.print_headline: New Microsoft Office With Continual Updates

snippet: The company will begin shipping Office 2016, an overhaul of the software suite, which offers apps like Word, PowerPoint, Excel, OneNote and Outlook.
